In England, in the seven days to 25 August, there were 180,928 new confirmed cases (319.9 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 18 August, there were 183,804 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 2% (2,876 fewer cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 30 August is 5,859,405 (10,361.4 cases per 100,000 population).
